data.title: Kristina Garcia - Arts & Culture writing fellow at Voice Of OC
data.meta_description: Kristina Garcia began their work experience in 2017 as a Copy and Lifestyle Editor at Daily Titan, where they later became a Senior Editor.
data.text:
Kristina Garcia began their work experience in 2017 as a Copy and Lifestyle Editor at Daily Titan, where they later became a Senior Editor. In 2020, they worked as an Arts & Culture writing fellow at Voice Of OC. The following year, they became an Editorial Board Member at American Papers, a position they held until October 2021. In 2022, they served as an Arts & Entertainment spring intern at the Los Angeles Times from March to June.

From 2017 to 2033, Kristina Garcia attended California State University, Fullerton. During this time, they pursued a Bachelor's degree with a major in Journalism and a minor in American studies.
